comments:
Hi Team,

 I created reports in BIRT 2.0 with some pie charts.I installed fresh copy of BIRT 2.1 and tries to open created reports. Now, the charts are missing in layout window. But in preview window they are visible and showing intended data.

Thanks
Lava Kumar Inampudi

Can you attach your report design, and your data in a csv file?
Can you attach your report design, and your data in a csv file?

Created an attachment (id=46885)
rptdesign file

design file

The attached design file seems already converted to 2.1 format and is opened ok in latest build. 

I noticed you are using Windows2000. For Windows 2000, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows NT 4.0 and Windows 98, you need GDI+ libaray seperately installed which is required by SWT advanced features. you may download the redistributable here: 
http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?familyid=6a63ab9c-df12-4d41-933c-be590feaa05a&displaylang=en#QuickInfoContainer

If you already verified the GDI+ support and still encounter problems, please attach the old 2.0 design file.

Now, I installed GDI+ and still my problem is not solved. 

I can't attach old 2.0 design file. Here the problem is all my files are converted into BIRT 2.1 without taking backup of old files. -:)(.  

It will be great, if you are able to give any work around or any other way.
Thanks.

It seems to be still GDI+ problem exist.Please have a look. Thanks.
Where have you installed the gdiplus.dll? It's recommended to put it in the eclipse root folder, e.g. where the eclipse.exe or main rcp exe resides.

It is solved. I placed extracted gdi+ dll in 3 places.(in win32 folder, folder which contains eclipse.exe and eclipse/plugins folder.
Thanks for timely help.
